skins.shipDescription: Lexington-class aircraft carrier ©` Lexington, Hull Number CV-2!
skins.selfIntroduction: Oh my~ I am aircraft carrier Lexington. I'm gentle? That's because I'm everyone's older sister~ That means you are a cute junior too! I feel assured since I've seen Saratoga working hard. Please give some attention to her as well
skins.acquisition: Good day, Mr. Commander~ I am Lexington. I heard that my name was from the first battlefield of the War for Independance. As an idol, I think I need to have a big heart. Don't you agree?
skins.login: Oh my~ Where are you heading, Commander? Don't worry. As long as I'm around, even the high flying crane won't get away
skins.details: Aww, your frown has curled your brows. You have your share of hard work too, Commander...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm not as lively as my younger sister, though I'm confident in my own charms. What do you think~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Oh my, where is Saratoga hiding? She's such a handful...
skins.secretaryIdle3: My eyes are gorgeous? Well, for an idol, my eyes have to look like this~
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you seem like a hapless little brother~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Oh goodness, are you unsatisfied with being the younger brother?

skins.shipDescription: Hehe¡­ sometimes you can completely change the way people see you with just a simple change in attire. Don't you agree, Commander~? Don¡¯t worry, I'm still your Lexington~
skins.acquisition: Hehe¡­ sometimes you can completely change the way people see you with just a simple change in attire. Don't you agree, Commander~? Don¡¯t worry, I'm still your Lexington~
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. Are you well acquainted with the customs of the Dragon Empery? Then, why don't you tell me a bit about their New Year? I'm quite curious~
skins.secretaryIdle1: An idol will change her outfits and dresses several times during a performance, each one bringing forth a different character... As long as I can bring smiles to everyone's faces, I will be happy.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Wearing this outfit seems to have gotten the children all fired up~ Hehe, Commander, don't you think this outfit brings out my domestic side?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, do you like my dress that much? Should we ask the Empery girls to tailor an outfit for you as well?
